CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: An onset oxidation potential of 0.94 V and an onset reduction potential of -0.88 V ( vs SCE ) are observed.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| onset oxidation potential |
| onset reduction potential |

In the given paragraph, the two "Material Name" entities are "onset oxidation potential" and "onset reduction potential". These are scientific terms used to describe the potential at which a chemical reaction starts to occur.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 0.94 V (vs SCE) |
| -0.88 V (vs SCE) |

In the given paragraph, the two entities "0.94 V (vs SCE)" and "-0.88 V (vs SCE)" are voltages and not material names. Therefore, there are no valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph.
